controls.label: Do you have risk-based systems and controls to ensure the trust exists and that trustee and beneficiary names (or class descriptions) have been provided?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based systems and controls for verifying trust existence and obtaining trustee/beneficiary information

controls.label: Do you collect the full name of the trust (if any)?
Do you collect the full business name (if any) of the trustee in respect of the trust?
Do you collect the type of the trust?
Do you collect the country in which the trust was established?
Do you collect the full name of the settlor of the trust (subject to exemptions for contributions <$10,000, deceased settlors, simplified verification, or custodian customers)?
When the trustee is an individual, do you collect the information required under your applicable CDD procedure for individuals (in respect of at least one individual trustee)?
When the trustee is a company, do you collect the information required under your applicable CDD procedure for companies (in respect of at least one company trustee)?
When the trustees comprise both individuals and companies, do you collect information required under the applicable CDD procedure for either an individual or a company trustee?
Do you have risk-based systems and controls to determine whether any additional KYC information relating to the trust's existence will be collected?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based approach to collecting additional trust existence KYC information

controls.label: Do you verify the full name of the trust (if any)?
When the trustee is an individual, do you verify information about at least one individual trustee in accordance with your CDD procedure for individuals?
When the trustee is a company, do you verify information about at least one company trustee in accordance with your CDD procedure for companies?
When the trustees comprise both individuals and companies, do you verify information about either an individual or a company trustee in accordance with the applicable procedures?
Do you verify the full name of the settlor of the trust (subject to exemptions for contributions <$10,000, deceased settlors, simplified verification, or custodian customers)?
Do you have risk-based systems and controls to determine whether and to what extent any other KYC information relating to the trust's existence should be verified?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based approach to verifying additional trust existence KYC information

controls.label: When determining additional collection and verification of trust information, do you have regard to ML/TF risk relevant to the designated service?
controls.detail-label: Describe how you assess ML/TF risk when deciding on additional collection/verification

controls.label: Do you use the simplified trustee verification procedure for eligible trusts (ASIC-registered MIS, unregistered wholesale MIS, government super funds, or Commonwealth-regulated trusts)?
controls.detail-label: Describe how you verify the trust's eligibility and apply the simplified procedure

controls.label: Do you collect the full name and address of each trustee in respect of the trust?
Do you collect either the full name of each beneficiary or (if beneficiaries are defined by class) details of the class?
Do you have risk-based systems and controls to determine whether any additional KYC information relating to trustees or beneficiaries will be collected?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based approach to collecting additional trustee/beneficiary KYC information

controls.label: Do you have risk-based systems and controls to determine whether and how to verify trustee and beneficiary information from approved sources?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based approach to verifying trustee/beneficiary information

controls.label: When determining additional collection and verification of trustee/beneficiary information, do you have regard to ML/TF risk relevant to the designated service?
controls.detail-label: Describe how you assess ML/TF risk when deciding on additional trustee/beneficiary collection/verification

controls.label: Do you verify trust information using trust deeds (original/certified copy/extract), reliable independent documents, reliable independent electronic data, or a combination thereof?
controls.detail-label: Describe the verification methods and sources you use

controls.label: Do you accept disclosure certificates to verify trust information when used for risk-based additional verification (para 4.4.6 or 4.4.11) and the information is not otherwise reasonably available?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for accepting and validating disclosure certificates

controls.label: Do you have risk-based systems and controls to respond to discrepancies arising during verification so you can remain reasonably satisfied about trust existence and trustee/beneficiary information?
controls.detail-label: Describe your systems for handling verification discrepancies

controls.detail-label: Describe how you identify eligible custodians/nominees and apply the reduced requirements
